language.name: Amoien
entries: The common language of Amoien, spread by the Windrose Guild. Most people speak Amoien.

language.name: Adruan
entries: The language spoken by the short folk of the Adrugon Empire. Most of Eurain speaks Adruan due to the spread of the Adrugon Empire.

language.name: Nokaltian
entries: An offshoot of Adruan, Nokaltian is the language of the Nokaltis. Because they do not teach their language to outsiders their capital of Zem Kalna is the only place where Nokaltian is spoken significantly.

language.name: Esivi
entries: The native language of the isolatory stone elves of Ilifir.

language.name: Okitan
entries: The divine language intrisically known by the Okita, the gods of the west.

language.name: Vrukrean
entries: The language of Vrukre. Used heavily by the nobility in formal government actions, and by merchants throughout national trade.
